p: The COVID-19 pandemic has presented many new challenges for the medical community. As clinicians, we must embrace innovations that could make a difference in containing the disease. Lung ultrasound has the potential to improve the management of COVID-19 patients, with key advantages over other imaging modalities. The advent of affordable, portable ultrasound devices with advanced capabilities such as information sharing, video learning, and teleguidance may further increase patient and provider safety and improve patient care.
